abstract.t: This document defines the framework for traffic engineering within native IP network, using Dual/Multi-Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) sessions strategy and Path Computation Engine (PCE) -based central control architecture. The proposed central mode control framework conforms to the concept that defined in [RFC8283]. The scenario and simulation results of traffic engineering in Native IP network is described in draft [I-D.ietf-teas-native-ip-scenarios].
